snippet.title: Are shops open in London this easter?
snippet.description: i wanna go to london this easter on 1/4-5/4. are shops open? i saw at a website that the museums are open but i don't know...

snippet.title: Do shops in london open on easter monday?
Brighton open on Easter Sunday?
snippet.description: Hi Does anyone know if the shops in Brighton (UK) will be closed on easter sunday (the 12th)? Thanks xxxxxx

snippet.title: Sunday trading argument help?
snippet.description: ... rates, it might not be financially sound to open. But why stop at shops though? Why are the people who are against Sunday/Easter trading are not in uproar about..., restaurants etc.? In places ...
